page.description: Settings for configuring recording behavior for the VideoRecorderPlayer control. These settings only apply when the VideoRecorderPlayer is running in a Cordova mobile application.

description.p: The *[ui:Duration]* property can be used to specify a maximum recorded length (in seconds) for a video. If set to *[-1]*, the user can record videos of any length using the VideoRecorderPlayer.
